sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Add Executive Modal">8b98554b3b523210bc1ccdd643e45a97</macroponent><name>select_2/now_default/items</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 */
function evaluateProperty({api}) {
  // ตรวจสอบว่าข้อมูลจาก Get choice fields 1 โหลดมาสำเร็จหรือไม่
  if (api.data.get_choice_fields_1 && api.data.get_choice_fields_1.choices) {
    return api.data.get_choice_fields_1.choices.map(choice => ({
      "id": choice.value,
      "label": choice.label
    }));
  }
  return [];
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-13 09:50:29</sys_created_on><sys_id>b436d3db3bd2f210bc1ccdd643e45aa8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>select_2/now_default/items</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BOT Application" source="x_1896436_bot_ap_0">566dc70e3b527210bc1ccdd643e45a0f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BOT Application">566dc70e3b527210bc1ccdd643e45a0f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_b436d3db3bd2f210bc1ccdd643e45aa8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-13 10:01:06</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
